name: Dreamblade
description:
Explore the world of Dreamblade

How to play
  • Basic move

    Use W to move forward, S to move backward, A to strafe left, and D to strafe right, Space bar to jump. For a more enjoyable exploring experience, you can double jump to get past obstacles.

  • Menu

    Press Esc to open the pause menu

Music "Sun and Stars"
from the album "World of Wonders"
